starting_equipment: Martial Weapon and a Shield OR Two Martial Weapons
Light Crossbow and 20 bolts OR Two Handaxes

level_1_features.name: Fighting Style
level_1_features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options: Archery, Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, or Two-Weapon Fighting.

level_1_features.name: Second Wind
level_1_features.description: You can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once per short or long rest.

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: You can cast prepared wizard spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You must prepare spells from your spellbook after a long rest.

level_1_features.name: Arcane Recovery
level_1_features.description: Once per day after a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots up to half your wizard level (rounded up).

starting_equipment: Light Crossbow and 20 bolts OR Any Simple Weapon
Leather Armor, Any Simple Weapon, and Two Daggers

level_1_features.name: Otherworldly Patron
level_1_features.description: You have struck a bargain with an otherworldly being. Choose a patron such as The Fiend, The Archfey, or The Great Old One.

level_1_features.name: Pact Magic
level_1_features.description: Your arcane research and the magic bestowed on you by your patron give you facility with spells. You cast warlock spells using Charisma.
